QuestData.Title: Bind the Glamour
QuestData.Description: It has been a very, very long time since our tribe has been called on to perform this rite. I will do the best I can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Allow Chief Rikkitun to enchant the Forked Blade.
QuestData.RewardText: The blade is prepared.$b$bNow, only one task remains: you must use it.

Objectives.Objective: Allow Chief Rikkitun to enchant the forked blade
